summary: The implementation comprehensively covers all 14 requirements from the BuildRequest. All major sections are present with appropriate content matching the specification. The React/TypeScript/Tailwind CSS stack is correctly used. The warm, earthy color palette is implemented as specified. The navigation system includes all required sections and is responsive. All financial figures, contact details, and technical specifications match the BuildRequest exactly.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister implementation with actor definition
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Backend API for contact form submission processing' as a non-goal. The backend/main.mo file was added, though it's currently empty. The BuildRequest only requires frontend implementation with React/TypeScript/Tailwind CSS.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration with login/logout functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'User authentication or member portal' as a non-goal. The implementation includes useInternetIdentity hook, InternetIdentityProvider, and useActor hook with authentication logic, identity management, and login status tracking.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer component with app identifier and year display functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: While a footer may be reasonable, REQ-12 only specifies contact information display and contact form. The Footer component adds navigation links, year calculation, and app identifier logic not requested in any requirement.
